name: digital-clock
description: A digital clock made out of bricks.
author: voximity

clock-behavior.description: The clock behavior. Count down, up, or show current time.

clock-authorized.description: A list of roles that are authorized to use clock commands.

clock-timestamp.description: The timestamp we're counting down to.

clock-include-days.description: Whether or not to include days.

clock-material.description: The material name of the clock bricks.

clock-color.description: Comma-separated RGB values for the clock bricks.

clock-colon-blink.description: Whether or not the colons should blink.

clock-update-seconds.description: The amount of time to wait between clock updates, in seconds.
